SafeBitmapShader - Class in com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas
The SafeBitmapShader class is designed to work in conjunction with SafeTranslatedCanvas to work around various Android issues with large canvases.
SafeBitmapShader(Bitmap, TileMode, TileMode) - Constructor for class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas.SafeBitmapShader

SafeDrawOverlay - Class in com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.overlay
An overlay class that uses the safe drawing canvas to draw itself and can be zoomed in to high levels without drawing issues.
SafeDrawOverlay() - Constructor for class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.overlay.SafeDrawOverlay
 
SafePaint - Class in com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas
The SafePaint class is designed to work in conjunction with SafeTranslatedCanvas to work around various Android issues with large canvases.
SafePaint() - Constructor for class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas.SafePaint
 
SafeTranslatedCanvas - Class in com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas
An implementation of ISafeCanvas that wraps a Canvas and adjusts drawing calls to the wrapped Canvas so that they are relative to an origin that is always at the center of the screen.

See ISafeCanvas for details
SafeTranslatedCanvas() - Constructor for class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas.SafeTranslatedCanvas
 
SafeTranslatedCanvas(Canvas) - Constructor for class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.views.safecanvas.SafeTranslatedCanvas
